page.title: 18GAMES PLAYED AT BUSHMILLS
page.content: At school we play badminton, football and hockey. {Badminton}is played with two or four players. One against one or two against two. The game is played on a court with a net across the middle. The players hit a shuttlecock with racquets, trying to get the shuttlecock to land on their opponents' court. {Football}has two teams of eleven players on a grass pitch. Each has goals and the players try and kick a football into their opponent's goal. {Hockey}has two teams of eleven players as well but the ball is a small hard ball which is passed on a pitch by being hit with a stick.
